snippet: The boy was found unconscious in an apartment in Flatbush and died at a hospital.
abstract: Flatbush, Brooklyn, woman is questioned by detectives after her 19-month-old son was taken to New York Community Hospital, where he was pronounced dead.
lead_paragraph: The boy was found unconscious in an apartment in Flatbush and died at a hospital.

headline.main: Police Question Brooklyn Woman in Death of 19-Month-Old Son
headline.print_headline: Police Question Woman in Death Of Son, 19 Months
